result.name: Genomic resources for a historical collection of cultivated two-row European spring barley genotypes.
result.description: In this project we developed a data resource based on 209 two-row European spring barley genotypes. The population is representative of pan-European breeding progress across the years from 1830 to 2014. The dataset comprises gene expression data generated by RNA-sequencing data of six different tissues across a range of developmental stages with shallow whole genome shotgun sequencing to complement the RNA-sequencing data for variant calling.
result.experimentType: Whole Genome Sequencing, Whole Transcriptome Sequencing
